changeSet.author: savinov_vu
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO public.regexp_tasks (id, number, en_title, ru_title, en_description, ru_description, matched_strings, excluded_strings, required_substrings, excluded_answers, answers, author_id, regexp_level_id, enabled, updated_at, created_at) VALUES (1, 1, 'simple word', 'просто слово', 'copy word', 'копируй слово', 'word', '', 'word', '', 'word', 1, 1, true, '2020-03-06 13:51:31.000000', '2020-03-06 13:51:34.000000'), (2, 2, 'one digit', 'одна цифра', 'use range', 'используй диапазон', '1,2,3,8', 'a,12,123,', '', '\\d,', '[0-9]', 1, 1, true, '2020-03-06 13:51:31.000000', '2020-03-06 13:51:34.000000');
